title: Chicken Lettuce Wraps
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed
1 tablespoon plus 1Â½ teaspoons peanut oil, divided
1 can (8 ounces) water chestnuts, drained and diced

steps.text: Coat large skillet with cooking spray
Add 1 tbsp. peanut oil to skillet
Add 1 1/2 lbs. chicken pieces to skillet
Cook for 3 minutes
Drain skillet of liquid
Add 3/4 c. chopped mushrooms to skillet
Add 8 oz. water chestnuts to skillet
Add 1 tbsp. minced ginger to skillet
Cook for at least 4 minutes
Cook until chicken is no longer pink
Drain skillet of liquid
Set skillet aside
Add 2 tbsp. rice vinegar to medium bowl
Add 2 tbsp. teriyaki sauce to bowl
Add 1 tbsp. soy sauce to bowl
Add 1/2 tsp. garlic powder to bowl
Add 1/4 tsp. red pepper flakes to bowl
Add 1 1/2 tsp. peanut oil to bowl
Whisk contents of bowl
Stir in 1 1/2 c. shredded carrots in bowl
Stir in 1/2 c. green onions in bowl
Stir in chicken mixture from skillet in bowl
Spoon mixture onto lettuce leaves
Sprinkle mixture with almonds and serve
